title: Changing font color in the main window
content: I tried to change the color of my fonts in all windows and I cannot. Can someone please give mew a hint or does this feature even work? Rick Meyer
creator: RickMeyer

title: Thunderbird
content: Hello, Over the last week or so I have not been able to send emails with Thunderbird but I can receive them with Thunderbird. I have contacted my internet provider, Telstra and they advise me it is not a problem with them as I can send emails via their Wed Mail. I have been getting a message saying to check my SMTP settings when I try to send emails via Thunderbird but I am not sure what to expect. My anti virus is with AVG. Hope you can help. John
creator: jjhavers
